description.html:
The Lidar and LogicalCamera sensors reuse message variables to improve performance, but the data entries need to be cleared before adding new ones to avoid repeated entries.

Before this PR, the header of a Lidar message after a few iterations looks like this:

header {
  stamp {
    sec: 93
    nsec: 52000000
  }
  data {
    key: "frame_id"
    value: "R2::base_link::front_laser"
  }
  data {
    key: "frame_id"
    value: "R2::base_link::front_laser"
  }
  data {
    key: "frame_id"
    value: "R2::base_link::front_laser"
  }
  data {
    key: "frame_id"
    value: "R2::base_link::front_laser"
  }
...

There should only be one 

  data {
    key: "frame_id"
    value: "R2::base_link::front_laser"
  }

title.raw: Deduplicate frame_ids from sensor message headers

title: Deduplicate frame_ids from sensor message headers
